summary:
The England men's cricket team represents England and Wales. It's governed by the England and Wales Cricket Board. England is a full member of the International Cricket Council (ICC) and plays Test, One Day International (ODI), and Twenty20 International (T20I) matches.

They played the first-ever Test match and One Day International (ODI) against Australia. England has a strong record, winning many matches and tournaments, including the Cricket World Cup in 2019 and the ICC T20 World Cup twice. They are currently ranked high in all three formats of the game by the ICC.
title: England cricket team
